name: OceanCleanUp
description:
This game is made for mini-jam and this mini-jam is my first.

We made this game for you to throw trash into the trash can. And if you leave it anywhere, I'll FIND YOU.

Control:

 W,A,S,D - movement.

 hold the E button - while collecting garbage, then you will have garbage with a bag.

Hold RMB - to pick up trash
